source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static scenery shot of a cozy attic bedroom. The room features a sloped ceiling with exposed wooden beams and a large skylight. A bed is visible on the left, while a small wooden desk and chair are on the right.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a static scenery shot of a cozy attic bedroom. The room features a sloped ceiling with exposed wooden beams and a large skylight. A bed is visible on the left, while a small wooden desk and chair are on the right.

generated_critique: The caption includes the subjective adjective "cozy," which should be removed. Additionally, for a static scenery shot with no subject motion, the instructions state to "briefly note this in one to three sentences" without going into detail. The current caption provides an unnecessary description of the room's contents. The caption should be revised to simply state that it is a static shot of a room and that there is no movement.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a static shot of an attic bedroom. There is no movement in the scene.
